heading: HR01733
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AQUACULTURE AND FISHERIES RESOURCES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE CONTINUED ILLEGAL, UNREPORTED AND UNREGULATED FISHING ACTIVITIES IN THE COUNTRY IN VIOLATION OF THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10654, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS 'AN ACT TO PREVENT, DETER AND ELIMINATE ILLEGAL, UNREPORTED AND UNREGULATED FISHING,  AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8550, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE PHILIPPINE FISHERIES CODE OF 1998", AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES'
status: Pending with the Committee on AQUACULTURE AND FISHERIES RESOURCES since 2018-03-14
